name: Discovery (MicroIllusions)
overview: Discovery is an Amiga educational game released in 1986 by MicroIllusions. In it, the Starship Discovery, carrying a cargo of alien animal specimens, has crash landed on a remote, inhospitable asteroid. From its crew of four, you alone have survived well enough to survey the damage and return the starship to flight. With the crash, 12 fuel crystals have been dislodged and must be replace. While moving through the craft, checking robots and computer panels, you are met with unexpected challenges!
